body_html: Just an update on the CLA status. The person who manages the nvidia-google-contributors list may have forgotten to add me to it. He sent me en email yesterday that he would add me, but he hasn't confirmed it yet. There is an internal event at NVIDIA today and tomorrow, most of the engineers are attending it, so this may take a day or two to resolve.

body: Just an update on the CLA status. The person who manages the nvidia-google-contributors list may have forgotten to add me to it. He sent me en email yesterday that he would add me, but he hasn't confirmed it yet. There is an internal event at NVIDIA today and tomorrow, most of the engineers are attending it, so this may take a day or two to resolve.
